thread.title: Embrionix Releases Industry’s Smallest SMPTE 2022-6 Gateway at IBC 2015
thread.title_full: Embrionix Releases Industry’s Smallest SMPTE 2022-6 Gateway at IBC 2015

author: Renaud lavoie
title: Embrionix Releases Industry’s Smallest SMPTE 2022-6 Gateway at IBC 2015
text:
Embrionix, the worldwide leader in advanced SFP (small form factor pluggable) and emSFP development, is announcing the world’s first SMPTE 2022-6 gateway in a SFP form factor. Embrionix will demonstrate the new SMPTE 2022-6 SFP gateway for broadcast video applications at the IBC Show, September 11-15, 2015 at booth 6.B02, showcasing the flexibility and power of the latest emSFP platforms. In addition, Embrionix’s selected customers will showcase the integration of such SFP in SDI products equipped with an SFP cage. “The SMPTE 2022-6 SFP is a breakthrough in miniaturization, which the broadcast and networking industries can greatly benefit from,” said Sarkis Abrahamian, VP of Business Development at Embrionix. “Embrionix has focused its expertise and development to release the industry’s smallest SMPTE 2022-6 in a footprint of 1cm x 3cm. This is a first in SFP technology history, as well as a first in our industry. This SMPTE 2022-6 gateway can be used inside SDI products or inside COTS IP switches. The release of the SMPTE 2022-6 marks the direction we are heading towards: more processing and more flexibility maintained in the SFP and SFP+ form factor,” added Abrahamian.
The new SMPTE 2022-6 are aimed at broadcast manufacturers who are designing and selling IP switches, SDI video routers, SDI processing cards and computer processing cards. They are also developed with the broadcasters in mind to simplify their IP studio deployments using their existing equipment as the host to these new SFPs.
“Our customers can get ahead of their competition by using our SMPTE 2022-6 and J2K SFPs to get their products to market faster and be completely SMPTE compliant right out of the gate,” said Renaud Lavoie, CEO of Embrionix. Broadcasters can now integrate this technology into all of their current SDI and IP products without a major cost investment.
Embrionix is showcasing its new SMPTE 2022-6 SFP+ technology in hall 6, IBC booth B02. As well, Embrionix will have a presence in more than 50 booths at IBC this year, demonstrating the flexibility and possibilities around SFP and emSFP modules. For more information, please contact us at info@embrionix.com or at http://www.embrionix.com . To reserve a time with Embrionix' team at IBC 2015, send us an email at info@embrionix.com
About Embrionix
Embrionix provides a new approach in the product interface market for broadcast manufacturers. Embrionix designs and builds innovative, advanced SMPTE VIDEO SFPs to close the gap between fiber optic deployments, coaxial deployments, legacy composite deployments and emerging technologies, such as HDMI, SDI to IP SFPs, J2K decoder and SMPTE 2022-6 gateway SFP+. By leveraging its core competencies in video broadcast, the company provides SFP modules (emSFP) with the highest level of flexibility to major broadcasters in the industry. Embrionix headquarters are based in Laval, Quebec. Embrionix sales offices, representatives, and distribution offices are located in Canada, United States, United Kingdom, South America, Germany, France, Israel, and Japan. For more information on pricing and availability, please visit http://www.embrionix.com or contact us at sales@embrionix.com.
